Package org.jtrim2.taskgraph

Class TaskNodeProperties

java.lang.Object
org.jtrim2.taskgraph.TaskNodeProperties
public class TaskNodeProperties extends Object
Defines the properties of a task node. Currently, this only defines the executor used to execute the action of the task node.

Instances of this class can can be instantiated through its TaskNodeProperties.Builder.

This class maybe extended by more specific implementations of the task execution framework.

Thread safety

Methods of this class are safely callable from multiple threads concurrently and the properties of TaskFactoryProperties cannot be changed.

Synchronization transparency

The methods of this class are synchronization transparent..
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • TaskNodeProperties

      protected TaskNodeProperties(TaskNodeProperties.Builder builder)
      Sets the properties of the TaskNodeProperties from the current value of the passed Builder.
      Parameters:
      builder - the builder from which a snapshot is created from. This argument cannot be null.

  • Method Details

    • getExecutor

      public final TaskExecutor getExecutor()
      Returns the executor used to execute action of the associated task node. If not specified anywhere, the default executor simply executes task synchronously on the calling thread.
      Returns:
      the executor used to execute action of the associated task node. This method never returns null.

    • tryGetDependencyErrorHandler

      public DependencyErrorHandler tryGetDependencyErrorHandler()
      Returns the handler to be called when the associated task node cannot due to a failure in one of its dependencies. The handler is called in the same context as the computation of the task node would have been.
      Returns:
      the handler to be called when the associated task node cannot due to a failure in one of its dependencies, or null if there is nothing to do with the failure.
